summary_promot:
"You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or strategy guide.

"
        "Your task is to write a short, clear, and informative **English summary** of the image.
"

img_summary: The image displays a video game equipment menu, showcasing the "Bronze Cloud Staff," an uncommon weapon currently equipped by the character. The staff has an attack value of 36 and a critical hit chance of 2%. The menu options include "Self-Advance," "Relics," "Inventory," "Journal," and "Settings." The interface allows sorting by default and provides options to examine or view details of the equipment.
